title: A Taste of Adelaide
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Ron Way
brief_description: An award-winning film of some of Adelaide’s fine restaurants and hotels; a tour laced together with delightful glimpses into some of the colourful, charming, little-known and well-known aspects of this unspoiled, unhurried city.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation and Ron Way
